2174.subject: WRT
2174.descrlong:
This course is offered to multilingual/ESL students simultaneously enrolled in BUS 201S: Macro Econ and Comm.  Working with the subject matter of that course, WRT 201 focuses on developing English language academic reading and writing skills.  These include understanding the structure and conventions of written work in social sciences, the rhetorical differences among assigned texts in the field, and key elements of research in the field, while increasing fluency and mastery in English.

(Prereq:  For those students required to take the EPT who receive a score below 147, WRT 95 must be completed as a prerequisite.  BUS 201S is a corequisite.)
